name: Gardening
description: Learn to grow a garden! Also learn to compost and make beautiful flower arrangements.

name: Sewing
description: Get the sewing machine out of your closet and set it up. Learn to sew and quilt here.

name: Music
description: Bring beautiful music into your life with music lessons.

name: Art
description: Learn pottery and drawing and painting - bring joy to your life!

name: Cooking
description: Stop burning your food with cooking lessons. Cook like the Pros.

name: Outdoor Life
description: Get some fresh air - go hiking, biking and camping.
